[![Image 2: yoga mat](https://images.indianexpress.com/2024/04/yoga-mat.jpg?w=270)](https://indianexpress.com/article/lifestyle/life-style/yoga-mat-toxic-chemicals-phthalates-pvc-fitness-9271413/)

### [Is your yoga mat making you sick?](https://indianexpress.com/article/lifestyle/life-style/yoga-mat-toxic-chemicals-phthalates-pvc-fitness-9271413/ "Is your yoga mat making you sick?")

April 26, 2024 6:11 pm

Who knew practicing yoga could be counterproductive? If you are using PVC yoga mats, then it's time for you to switch to a safer alternative

YOGA PHOTOS
-----------

YOGA VIDEOS
-----------

[![Image 3](https://images.indianexpress.com/2017/08/sddefault-21.jpg?w=270)](https://indianexpress.com/videos/idea-exchange-video/sadhguru-jaggi-vasudevs-take-on-social-media-yoga-the-blue-whale-game/)

[![Image 4: International Yoga day, PM narendra Modi, CM Yogi Adityanath, Yoga day celebrations, International yoga day news, latest news, India news, National news](https://images.indianexpress.com/2017/06/darjeeling0033.jpg?w=270)](https://indianexpress.com/videos/news-video/international-yoga-day-amid-drizzle-pm-modi-leads-celebrations-in-lucknow/)

[![Image 5](https://images.indianexpress.com/2016/01/78290dea-41de-43ce-b292-7c1fbec090cc.jpeg?w=270)](https://indianexpress.com/videos/news-video/modi-govt-has-failed-to-bring-back-black-money-congress/)

### [Modi govt. has failed to bring back black money: Congress](https://indianexpress.com/videos/news-video/modi-govt-has-failed-to-bring-back-black-money-congress/ "Modi govt. has failed to bring back black money: Congress")

January 12, 2016 7:33 am

New Delhi, Jan 12 (ANI): Reacting on the black money statement of Yoga Guru Baba Ramdev, Congress leader Shobha Oza on Tuesday said the Modi government, which had black money as an important issue in their election manifesto, has now gone silent on the matter. She further said that PM Modi has failed on his promise to bring the black money back. Meanwhile, Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leader Sudesh Verma said that necessary steps were being taken by the government on black money and assured that the results would come soon.

data.title: Yoga News: Latest Yoga News and Updates at News18
data.content:
Aries

Ganesha says that today will be a good day. You will be successful in fulfilling some of your old desires which will bring you happiness. Today your creativity will flourish and you will introduce people to your art. Today you will also have a good income. Your hard work related to work will be successful. Your self-confidence will increase but some arrogance will also be reflected in your behaviour. This may cause problems in your married life. People living a love life will get excellent results today. You will get financial benefits.

**Lucky Number:** 6

**Lucky Color:** Sky Blue

**By Astrologer Chirag Daruwalla**

[read more](https://www.news18.com/astrology)

data.title: Yoga News, Research
data.content:
[Skip to content](https://www.news-medical.net/?tag=/Yoga#main)

  [![Image 1: News-Medical](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/themes/Standard/images/nm-logo-4.png)](https://www.news-medical.net/)

Yoga is an ancient system of practices used to balance the mind and body through exercise, meditation (focusing thoughts), and control of breathing and emotions. Yoga is being studied as a way to relieve stress and treat sleep problems in cancer patients.

[![Image 2: Older women are different than older men. Their health is woefully understudied.](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2016/5/a5603909c7e5417e9c2efae17665161a-310x240.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Older-women-are-different-than-older-men-Their-health-is-woefully-understudied.aspx)

[![Image 3: Physical activity in natural settings offers benefits over other exercise](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_783058_454611923308449046709-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Physical-activity-in-natural-settings-offers-benefits-over-other-exercise.aspx)

[![Image 4: Research highlights positive impact of yoga and mediterranean diet on elderly health](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_781058_454403652816666654299-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Research-highlights-positive-impact-of-yoga-and-mediterranean-diet-on-elderly-health.aspx)

[![Image 5: Study reveals common yet overlooked mystical experiences impact well-being](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_780928_45436411590162046854-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-reveals-common-yet-overlooked-mystical-experiences-impact-well-being.aspx)

[![Image 6: Altered states of consciousness common in meditation, study finds](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2017/6/Close_up_Rear_View_of_Slim_Woman_Meditating_in_a_Lotus_Yoga_Position_at_the_Poolside-PlusONE_6f0ddbb60be5472eb9fd96a4b2857b76-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Altered-states-of-consciousness-common-in-meditation-study-finds.aspx)

[![Image 7: Yogic practices enhance heart health and functional capacity in heart failure patients](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2018/2/Human_heart_with_heart_vessles_inside_human_body%2c_3D_illustration-Kateryna_Kon_325674ec0af4464ab8e6190671c7aede-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Yogic-practices-enhance-heart-health-and-functional-capacity-in-heart-failure-patients.aspx)

[![Image 8: Relaxation interventions can be offered to lactating parents who would like to improve milk supply and increase well-being](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_779398_4542132110464128172-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Relaxation-interventions-can-be-offered-to-lactating-parents-who-would-like-to-improve-milk-supply-and-increase-well-being.aspx)

[![Image 9: Study shows yoga's positive impact on emotional health in forensic psychiatry](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2017/1/%40Man_wearing_white_cloth_sits_on_yoga_map_with_yoga_and_meditation_poses_in_the_park_-_Chanyanuch_Wannasinlapin_4996856c75ea43da9a6290f8be74c377-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Study-shows-yogas-positive-impact-on-emotional-health-in-forensic-psychiatry.aspx)

[![Image 10: Genetic predisposition to stress linked with higher heart attack risk](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2016/5/3d_rendered_illustration_-_heart_attack-Sebastian_Kaulitzki-590_e9955014335b44c6b19ec71c7ced0b5a-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Genetic-predisposition-to-stress-linked-with-higher-heart-attack-risk.aspx)

### [Genetic predisposition to stress linked with higher heart attack risk](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Genetic-predisposition-to-stress-linked-with-higher-heart-attack-risk.aspx)

People with specific genetic traits and those who have anxiety or depression have a significantly higher heart attack risk during periods of social or political stress than at other times, according to a new study being presented at the American College of Cardiology's Annual Scientific Session.

[![Image 11: Physical activity is directly related to the risk of depression in married women, but not in married men](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_774981_45371238105347226943-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Physical-activity-is-directly-related-to-the-risk-of-depression-in-married-women-but-not-in-married-men.aspx)

[![Image 12: Statistical models vs. front-line workers: Who knows best how to spend opioid settlement cash?](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/tags/TagImage-4721-450569370587384265607-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Statistical-models-vs-front-line-workers-Who-knows-best-how-to-spend-opioid-settlement-cash.aspx)

[![Image 13: Yoga may benefit individuals with back pain](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2016/12/Man_lower_back_pain_-_Twinsterphoto__e46b4fe80a6944be854ed3d4d793d2aa-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Yoga-may-benefit-individuals-with-back-pain.aspx)

### [Yoga may benefit individuals with back pain](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Yoga-may-benefit-individuals-with-back-pain.aspx)

New research published in the Journal of Orthopaedic Research suggests that the physical postures, breathing exercises, and mindfulness practices of yoga may benefit individuals with back pain.

[![Image 14: Exercise unleashes anti-inflammatory power against autoimmune diseases](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_772175_45341257986597229630-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Exercise-unleashes-anti-inflammatory-power-against-autoimmune-diseases.aspx)

[![Image 15: Exercise is an effective treatment for depression, with walking, jogging, yoga, and strength training more effective than other exercises](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_772087_45338440443854175959-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Exercise-is-an-effective-treatment-for-depression-with-walking-jogging-yoga-and-strength-training-more-effective-than-other-exercises.aspx)

[![Image 16: Study highlights exercise as a powerful tool to fight depression](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/tags/TagImage-914-45296020466307879052-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-highlights-exercise-as-a-powerful-tool-to-fight-depression.aspx)

[![Image 17: Study reveals alarming levels of burnout among Michigan nurses](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2017/6/the_nurse_checking_a_patient%27s_pulse-Rungtiwa_Hruwatanakul_77b124aa861e4ac5a47a5236f2c6070b-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-reveals-alarming-levels-of-burnout-among-Michigan-nurses.aspx)

[![Image 18: Does Sudarshan Kriya Yoga (SKY) practice reduce stress and increase well-being in practicing physicians?](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_770940_45327277829571765640-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Does-Sudarshan-Kriya-Yoga-/(SKY/)-practice-reduce-stress-and-increase-well-being-in-practicing-physicians.aspx)

[![Image 19: Can yoga improve your prostate health?](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_769556_453103500028935161271-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Can-yoga-improve-your-prostate-health.aspx)

[![Image 20: Yoga nidra practice improves sleep and enhances memory](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2017/3/Good_nights_sleep_-_Goodluz_5edf6811462b4d0280b9b9189683dde9-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Yoga-nidra-practice-improves-sleep-and-enhances-memory.aspx)

### [Yoga nidra practice improves sleep and enhances memory](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Yoga-nidra-practice-improves-sleep-and-enhances-memory.aspx)

Practicing yoga nidra-;a kind of mindfulness training-; might improve sleep, cognition, learning, and memory, even in novices, according to a pilot study publishing in the open-access journal PLOS ONE on December 13 by Karuna Datta of the Armed Forces Medical College in India, and colleagues.

[![Image 21: New evidence-based clinical practice guidelines to address peripartum depression](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2016/3/Depression_-_KieferPix_-_590_9637aadecf79474ebb8d9c5443ae8832-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/New-evidence-based-clinical-practice-guidelines-to-address-peripartum-depression.aspx)

Terms

While we only use edited and approved content for Azthena answers, it may on occasions provide incorrect responses. Please confirm any data provided with the related suppliers or authors. We do not provide medical advice, if you search for medical information you must always consult a medical professional before acting on any information provided.

Your questions, but not your email details will be shared with OpenAI and retained for 30 days in accordance with their privacy principles.

Please do not ask questions that use sensitive or confidential information.

Read the full [Terms & Conditions](https://www.news-medical.net/medical/terms).
